com.ndi

Class Validator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ndi.Validator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Validatable

    public class Validator
extends java.lang.Object
implements Validatable
    A wrapper class around com.ndi.Everit's json-schema validator implementation: 'https://github.com/everit-org/json-schema', which follows the Draft v7 specification

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.ndi.Validatable

        Validatable.Util

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Validator(org.json.JSONObject document, org.json.JSONObject schema)
      Initialize an instance of Validator by passing in instance of JSONObject
      Validator(java.lang.String document, java.lang.String schema)
      Initialize an instance of Validator by passing in string which is the content of the JSON document and JSON schema document

    • Constructor Detail

      • Validator

        public Validator(java.lang.String document,
                 java.lang.String schema)
        Initialize an instance of Validator by passing in string which is the content of the JSON document and JSON schema document
        Parameters:
        document - the JSON document which will be validated
        schema - the schema that the JSON file will be validated against

      • Validator

        Initialize an instance of Validator by passing in instance of JSONObject

    • Method Detail

      • addValidators

        public Validator addValidators(java.util.List<org.everit.json.schema.FormatValidator> validators)
        Add a list of format validators such that the validator recognizes the costume format keyword for string
        Parameters:
        validators - an List of org.everit.json.schema.FormatValidator
        Returns:
        a new instance of Validator with a new formatValidator added

      • addValidator

        public Validator addValidator(org.everit.json.schema.FormatValidator validator)
        Add a format validators such that the validator recognizes costume format keyword for string
        Parameters:
        validator - an instance of org.everit.json.schema.FormatValidator
        Returns:
        a new instance of Validator with a new formatValidator added

      • getReport

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getReport()
        get a report detailing the error message of the validation. If the report is empty, performValidation() will be called, otherwise it will just return the report
        Specified by:
        getReport in interface Validatable
        Returns:
        a key-value pairs, where the key represents the JSON key that has the wrong type, and the value represents a string detailing the error message. If the HashMap is empty, then it means the json document is valid

      • readJSONFile

        public static org.json.JSONObject readJSONFile(java.lang.String filepath)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        A helper method that can used to read a JSON File from an absolute path, and then convert it into an instance of JSONObject
        Parameters:
        filepath - the absolute path to the JSON file
        Returns:
        an instance of JSONObject
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when file path is invalid or any error occurred while reading the file
